LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_AverageDPS.label: melee damage per second
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_AverageDPS.description: Damage done per second in melee combat, if all attacks hit.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DamageMultiplier.label: melee damage multiplier
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DamageMultiplier.description: Damage multiplier applied to melee combat.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_CooldownMultiplier.label: melee cooldown
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_CooldownMultiplier.descripti: Multiplier on attack delay for items made of this material.
LanguageData.SharpDamageMultiplier.label: 近身利器伤害
LanguageData.SharpDamageMultiplier.description: 这种材料所制作的物品的利器伤害（切削/戳刺伤害）的乘数。
LanguageData.BluntDamageMultiplier.label: 近身钝器伤害
LanguageData.BluntDamageMultiplier.description: 这种材料所制作物品的钝器伤害的乘数。
